sentence.Network_en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentence.Network_en: Chantal was writhing in pain and bathed in perspiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 夏恩托痛苦地翻来覆去，汗水淋淋。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, from perspirer (see perspire)

entry.def: Perspiration is the liquid which comes out on the surface of your skin when you are hot or frightened.

example.ex: His hands were wet with perspiration.

means.word_mean: 1. salty fluid secreted by sweat glands;
2. the process of the sweat glands of the skin secreting a salty fluid;

auth_sentence.content: A trickle of perspiration ran down her forehead.
auth_sentence.res_content: A trickle of perspiration ran down her forehead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A trickle of perspiration ran down her forehead.

auth_sentence.content: The perspiration which sprung from his brow.
auth_sentence.res_content: The perspiration which sprung from his brow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The perspiration which sprung from his brow.

auth_sentence.content: He could barely hold on...because his hands were so slick with perspiration.
auth_sentence.res_content: He could barely hold on...because his hands were so slick with perspiration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He could barely hold on...because his hands were so slick with perspiration.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏

sentences.en: It is so hot that my clothes are wet with perspiration.
sentences.cn: 天太热了, 我的衣服被汗水湿透了。
